android.support.v17.leanback.supportleanbackshowcase.app.details

Class DetailViewActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • android.support.v17.leanback.supportleanbackshowcase.app.LeanbackActivity
        • android.support.v17.leanback.supportleanbackshowcase.app.details.DetailViewActivity

  • public class DetailViewActivity
extends LeanbackActivity
    Activity class to render the specific details view fragment based on type of content chosen. Fragments could be either DetailViewTvShowFragment for VOD with episodes, DetailViewMovieFragment for Movie VOD, or DetailViewLiveBroadcastFragment for live TV channel.

        public boolean onKeyDown(int KeyCode,

        Overrides onKeyDown method for handling KEYCODE_ESCAPE to exit the application
        Parameters:

        event - KeyEvent of the key pressed
        Returns:
